pages.text: The Enderman Talisman prevents enderman aggression by looking at an Enderman.  They will still be mad if you attack them. The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_normal)Normal Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_explorer)Force of Explorer$(/l).
